products.title: Perfect Fit Hive Deluxe Midnight Duo Thermal Blind
products.description: Hive deluxe has been developed to include the same properties we've come to expect from hive such as insulation, anti-static, heat blocking and sound absorbance, but in a much softer fabri, adding a touch of luxury to your windows. Perfect fit hive deluxe midnight duo thermal blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
